Description: This registry defines messages for representing AmiOem errors in Redfish

ActionCancelUpdateFirmware.Description: Indicates that action was submitted to cancel Device doing FwUpdate.
ActionCancelUpdateFirmware.Message: The action %1 was submitted to cancel %2 doing FwUpdate.

ActionCancelUpdateFirmwareDuplicate.Description: Indicates that action had already submitted to cancel FwUpdate before.
ActionCancelUpdateFirmwareDuplicate.Message: The action %1 had already submitted to cancel FwUpdate before, so skipping the action.

ActionCancelUpdateFirmwareRejected.Description: Indicates that action was submitted but rejected because there is already starting flashing firmware or there is no FwUpdate in processing.
ActionCancelUpdateFirmwareRejected.Message: The action %1 was submitted but rejected because %2 is already starting flashing firmware or there is no FwUpdate in processing for %2.

ActionInProgress.Description: Indicates that this action cannot be processed because media redirection is in progress.
ActionInProgress.Message: Cannot change the %1 value, because media redirection is in progress.
ActionInProgress.Resolution: Stop all the active media redirections and resubmit the request.

ActionPowerOnNotAllowed.Description: Indicates that action was submitted to Power on System but rejected because the system is performing CPLD|BIOS update.
ActionPowerOnNotAllowed.Message: The action %1 was submitted to Power on System but rejected because the system is performing CPLD|BIOS update.
ActionPowerOnNotAllowed.Resolution: Resubmit action after CPLD|BIOS FwUpdate completed.

ActionUpdateFirmwareNotAllowed.Description: Indicates that action was submitted but rejected because system power is on.
ActionUpdateFirmwareNotAllowed.Message: The action %1 was submitted but rejected because system power is on.
ActionUpdateFirmwareNotAllowed.Resolution: Resubmit action after turning off the system.

ActionUpdateFirmwareRejected.Description: Indicates that action was submitted but rejected because there is already in flashing or resource updatable now is false.
ActionUpdateFirmwareRejected.Message: The action %1 was submitted but rejected because there is already in flashing or resource updatable now is false.
ActionUpdateFirmwareRejected.Resolution: Resubmit action after in progress flashing complete.

AlreadyInUpdateMode.Description: Indicates that action was submitted but terminated because BMC have already in update Mode.
AlreadyInUpdateMode.Message: The action is terminated since %1 is being upgraded via %2 at the same time.

DownloadFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is downloading firmware image file from Remote Server.
DownloadFirmware.Message: Device is downloading firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

DownloadFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device download firmware image file from Remote Server failed.
DownloadFirmwareFailed.Message: Device download firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

DownloadFirmwareSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device download firmware image file from Remote Server successfully.
DownloadFirmwareSuccessful.Message: Device download firmware image file from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

FirmwareUpdateCompleted.Description: Indicates that device firmware update is completed.

FirmwareUpdateFailed.Description: Indicates that device firmware update is failed.

FlashFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is flashing firmware.
FlashFirmware.Message: Device is flashing firmware for action %1.

FlashFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device flash firmware update failed.
FlashFirmwareFailed.Message: Device flash firmware update for action %1 failed.

HostInterfaceConnectionEstablished.Description: The host interface connection is established.

HpmFirmwareUpdateFailed.Description: Indicates that HPM firmware update is failed.

HpmInvalidImage.Description: Indicates that the HPM firmware image is invalid.
HpmInvalidImage.Resolution: Resubmit the request with a valid HPM image.

HpmUnsupportedComponent.Description: Indicates that the HPM firmware image has one or more unsupported components.
HpmUnsupportedComponent.Message: HPM firmware image has one or more unsupported components.
HpmUnsupportedComponent.Resolution: Resubmit the request with a compatible HPM firmware image.

InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Description: Indicates that uploaded firmware image is not a valid one.
InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Message: The uploaded %1 is not a valid firmware image.
InvalidFirmwareImageFormat.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid firmware image.

InvalidFlashType.Description: Indicates that action was submitted but rejected because it will accept different type of FlashType.
InvalidFlashType.Message: The action %1 was submitted but rejected because it will accept different type of FlashType.
InvalidFlashType.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid FlashType.

InvalidNumberOfArguments.Description: Indicates that the no of requested arguments to upload the value is invalid.
InvalidNumberOfArguments.Message: The arguments %1 used for uploading the value is not a valid one.
InvalidNumberOfArguments.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid no of argument.

InvalidRequestArgument.Description: Indicates that the requested argument to upload a value is an invalid.
InvalidRequestArgument.Message: The argument %1 used for uploading a value is not a valid one.
InvalidRequestArgument.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid request argument.

InvalidRequestArgumentValueType.Description: Indicates that the requested argument value type is an invalid.
InvalidRequestArgumentValueType.Message: The value type %2 used for an argument %1 is not a valid one.
InvalidRequestArgumentValueType.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid request argument value type.

InvalidSignKeyFormat.Description: Indicates that uploaded signed key is not a valid one.
InvalidSignKeyFormat.Message: The uploaded %1 is not a valid signed key. Acceptable signed key extension is .pem
InvalidSignKeyFormat.Resolution: Resubmit the request with the valid signed key.

LDAPCommonNameTypeUpdateFailed.Description: Indicates that the %1 value cannot be changed if EncryptionType value is NoEncrytption or SSL.
LDAPCommonNameTypeUpdateFailed.Message: Cannot change %1 value if EncryptionType value is not startTLS.
LDAPCommonNameTypeUpdateFailed.Resolution: Please make sure to give the value for EncryptionType as startTLS to change the value of CommonNameType as FQDN .

MediaConfigUpdateFailed.Description: Indicates that Error in setting RMedia Configuration.
MediaConfigUpdateFailed.Message: Error in setting Media Configuration. Code : %1

MultipleSMTPCertificatesDetected.Description: Indicates that the operation failed because both Primary and Secondary SMTP Certificates Parameters were detected for POST
MultipleSMTPCertificatesDetected.Message: The operation failed because both Primary and Secondary SMTP Certificates Parameters were detected for the POST operation
MultipleSMTPCertificatesDetected.Resolution: Select Primary Certificate Parameters OR Secondary Certificate Parameters for the POST operation

PfrFirmwareUpdateFailed.Description: Indicates that PFR firmware update is failed.

PfrInvalidUpdateCapsule.Description: Indicates that the PFR Update Capsule is invalid.
PfrInvalidUpdateCapsule.Resolution: Resubmit the request with a valid PFR Update Capsule.

PfrNotReadyForUpdate.Description: Indicates that the PFR state not yet ready for update.
PfrNotReadyForUpdate.Message: PFR state not yet ready for update.

PrepareFlashArea.Description: Indicates that device is preparing flash area for firmware update.
PrepareFlashArea.Message: Device is preparing flash area for action %1.

PrepareFlashAreaFailed.Description: Indicates that device prepare flash area failed.
PrepareFlashAreaFailed.Message: Device prepare flash area for action %1 failed.

PrepareFlashAreaSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device prepare flash area successfully.
PrepareFlashAreaSuccessful.Message: Device prepare flash area for action %1 successfully.

SSLCertificateBadFile.Description: Indicates that the CA Bundle file has bad format or the file not exist.
SSLCertificateBadFile.Message: Problem with reading the SSL CA Bundle certificates.
SSLCertificateBadFile.Resolution: Upload proper CA Bundle file in PEM format.

SSLVerifyFailed.Description: Indicates that the remote server's SSL certificate was deemed not OK.
SSLVerifyFailed.Message: The SSL certificate of remote server %1 was deemed not OK.
SSLVerifyFailed.Resolution: Set proper certificate bundle which contains all intermediate certificates and root certificate(s) as required.

StartFirmwareUpdate.Description: Indicates that action was submitted to do firmware update.
StartFirmwareUpdate.Message: The action %1 was submitted to do firmware update.

SupportDisabled.Description: Indicates that the operation failed because %1 is already disabled and cannot accept additional requests.
SupportDisabled.Message: The operation failed because %1 is already disabled and can no longer take incoming requests.
SupportDisabled.Resolution: Enable the support and resubmit the request.

SupportEnabled.Description: Indicates that the operation failed because %1 is already enabled and cannot accept additional requests.
SupportEnabled.Message: The operation failed because %1 is already enabled and can no longer take incoming requests.
SupportEnabled.Resolution: Disable the support and resubmit the request.

VerifyFirmware.Description: Indicates that device is verifying firmware image file.
VerifyFirmware.Message: Device is verifying firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

VerifyFirmwareFailed.Description: Indicates that device verify firmware image file failed.
VerifyFirmwareFailed.Message: Device verify firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

VerifyFirmwareSuccessful.Description: Indicates that device verify firmware image file successfully.
VerifyFirmwareSuccessful.Message: Device verify firmware image file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

VerifySignKey.Description: Indicates that device is verifying sign key file.
VerifySignKey.Message: Device is verifying sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2.

VerifySignKeyFailed.Description: Indicates that device verify sign key file failed.
VerifySignKeyFailed.Message: Device verify sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 failed.

VerifySignKeySuccessful.Description: Indicates that device verify sign key file successfully.
VerifySignKeySuccessful.Message: Device verify sign key file which from Remote Path - %1 for action %2 successfully.

WebServerRestarting.Description: Indicates that the web server is restarting, so it will be unreachable for a few seconds.
WebServerRestarting.Message: Web server is being restarted. It will be unreachable for a few seconds.
WebServerRestarting.Resolution: Wait a few seconds before sending additional requests.

Name: AmiOem Message Registry
